name: Operation Endurance
description:
Explore the IBM Space Operation Endurance mission in Unreal Engine. View the simulated launch on an accurate digital twin of the earth, the rocket, and the satellite.

The ENDURANCE CubeSat mission is about making space accessible to everyone on this planet - In other words, Democratizing Access to Space.

HOW TO PLAY: press 1,2,3,4 on keyboard to switch cameras. Click to speed up time if desired.
